body: this is what guys do at sleepovers
@fujoshi-sama maybe you should stop critizing people's work and get a life. 🤷 clearly the life you're living right now is so toxic. ew

Iv'e been following this artist for a long time and it's just that they kept their retro 90's type of style. they did improve their anatomy and expressions and dynamics over the years. I love this style, it feels old but also still relevant
Whatever you say “Fujoshi” this artstyle is amazing, there’s literally nothing wrong with not improving.
Damn y'all are pretty mad that I've seen fit to critique this artist. Maybe stop getting mad over internet strangers' opinions and get on with your lives 🤷

@fujoshi-sama ok sure bro. How about you try drawing a comic then. Fucking asshole. Cant even appreciate someone's work. The fuck you mean "..hasn't improved at all..." Its their style. Fucking dumbass. Rude bitch.

@fujoshi-sama first of all your name means rotten-girl plus what’s the point of the artstyle? it’s doesn’t even look that bad. if you wanna judge someone who isn’t ”improving” artstyle how about you improve your porn addiction.

Nah I've been drawing as a hobby/side gig for over ten yrs. I read Gravitation back in high school and thought it sucked back then, and it's disappointing to see the author never improving over all that time. Okimura, if you compare the author's original manga with this, they're virtually identical in quality.
And you can't even draw a stickman...yet u wanna judge the author?
Did you meant the storyboarding or the art? The art style is good imo, and storyboarding isn't suppose to be that grand for a doujin anyway
This artist has been drawing BL since the fucking 90s and still hasn't improved at all. What the hell is even the point??
